description: It is important to be somewhat familiar with CC:Tweaked at this stage of the modpack, since you need to use it a lot.

<text>First of all, there is a nice documentation for this mod <link href="https://tweaked.cc/"><blue><underline>just right here</underline></blue></link>. Nothing much to say, actually. Read "Getting Started" carefully, watch some tutorial, join computer mods discord and have fun!</text>
Also, you need to learn Lua. Not much, actually, if you just planning to use this mod as minecraft mod and now developing your own operating system for it.

<text>If you are familiar with any programming language, Lua is quite easy to learn, just visit <link href="https://learnxinyminutes.com/lua/"><blue><underline>this site.</underline></blue></link></text>
If you not familiar with programming, then you should prepare for quite a journey and join computer mods discord. Adventure awaits.
